channel.title: [Allstar-Scape] Montanascape V1 |Highscores|Webclient|24-7Online|Community
channel.description:
Welcome to Montana 24-7 online Hosted owner is Mod allstar
Total amount of players currently online: [IMG]http://82.74.106.17/totalonline/players.php[/img]
One of the players favourite thing in the server: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/10yl5xy.png[/img]
Nice amount of players daily online: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34791u8.png[/img]
client download [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?liiwohgd9roegp4]client download link[/url] highscores at [url=http://rsadsl.co.nr]highscore link[/url] forums at [url=http://montana.createaforum.com]forum link[/url]
======================================== webclient at [url=http://82.74.106.17/totalonline/wbon.html]webclient click here to play![/url] ========================================
Information: - anti dupe - all skills up to 99 - 99 youll need 13m xp - lamps that give 750k xp - mysterybox that gives random item(only at thieving, mining and agility) - casket that gives high value item(if you are lucky, only at thieving) - warning system - 7 bosses to fight!( with also a solo boss!) - server information (overall players in emote tab) - GSMINI - Slayer -pkbox - barrows - custom item( like torva, primal and looooooaaaaaaaaaads more!)
Pictures of the server:
Boss fight list [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2aep6qv.png[/img]
King black drop: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/21oqwb7.png[/img]
pkbox [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/9h8emp.png[/img]
